summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transaction details for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas for the period of July 1, 2017, to July 31, 2017. It outlines various debits and credits, including payroll and tax deductions, as well as service charges. The document is part of a confidential financial record related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is mentioned as the account holder for the business checking account detailed in the document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is referenced as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The document details account transactions for Richard Kahn's business checking account at Deutsche Bank.
The account had a beginning balance of $80,973.75 and an ending balance of $80,973.75 as of July 31, 2017.
Multiple preauthorized debits for payroll and tax payments are listed, totaling significant amounts.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
The document is marked as confidential and is part of the Epstein case records.
